pageContext.claim: “Well, the good news is that we already pay them [the military], whether they are on the border or someplace else. You know, the fact is, they're being paid, and it's our great military, and we have -- we can't take any chances.”
pageContext.analysis: This is misleading. The Pentagon spent $72 million as of Nov. 20, 2018, just on barbed wire, transportation and housing for about 5,900 active-duty troops deployed to the border. An additional $138 million was spent by the National Guard as of late November 2018.
